question_text: You are replacing a wireless card in an older laptop. Which two steps are typically part of the process?
answer_options: Connect main and auxiliary antenna wires
Open the display bezel to access the screen
Remove the back panel to access the card
correct_answer: Connect main and auxiliary antenna wires
Remove the back panel to access the card
explanation: Older laptops may use mini PCIe wireless cards, which require antenna connections and access from a back panel.
